channel.title: Explanation of this section
channel.description: Here you can basically share ideas for quests or entire stories, id recommend asking before you use someone elses story for a game.

item.title: Explanation of this section
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Unfortunately, you can’t expect everyone to read what boards are for. Since we had a few mix-ups already.

Read full topic

item.title: Explanation of this section
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:8, topic:411294”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=512559.msg3720503#msg3720503 date=1313898226]

This allows members discuss and share new and original ideas or new ways a story can be told

Confused me there. It sounds like its about how you tell a story, not the story itself.
[/quote]That’s what I said!

Well then the board needs a new name! I have no other skills in any of these areas, but I do plan to post in this little section quite enough to keep it alive.
How about the story board section?[/quote]

Story telling & Ideas

General is read as

Story telling
Story Ideas

seeing as how story is at the front, and the description clearly says you can post stories

Read full topic

item.title: Explanation of this section
item.dc:creator: @Morx Morx
item.description:
@Morx wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:8, topic:411294”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=512559.msg3720503#msg3720503 date=1313898226]

This allows members discuss and share new and original ideas or new ways a story can be told

Confused me there. It sounds like its about how you tell a story, not the story itself.
[/quote]That’s what I said!

Well then the board needs a new name! I have no other skills in any of these areas, but I do plan to post in this little section quite enough to keep it alive.
How about the story board section?[/quote]

That seems simple enough…also i look forward to seeing your stories as i suck at writing storylines.

Read full topic

item.title: Explanation of this section
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:

This allows members discuss and share new and original ideas or new ways a story can be told

Confused me there. It sounds like its about how you tell a story, not the story itself.
[/quote]That’s what I said![/quote]
Well then the board needs a new name! I have no other skills in any of these areas, but I do plan to post in this little section quite enough to keep it alive.
How about the story board section?

Read full topic

item.title: Explanation of this section
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

So I cant use this section to develope a full story line, then just let those who like it make it into a game?
I’m a fan of writing short stories, and I feel with some work they can.be developed into full games with some elaboration, and I was hoping this section would offer that.

Read full topic
